name: Compressed Poser Hand Pose File
summary: Learn about .HDZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Uncompressed Poser hand pose files use the .HD2 extension.
NOTE: Poser was originally developed by Smith Micro, but was sold to Bondware in June 2019.

description: Compressed hand pose data file used by Poser, a 3D character modeling and animation program; includes pose data specific to a character's hands, such as hand motions and finger positions.
